nodes.text: PALLAS-Eleven was an aged assassin droid who worked in a crew led by the Lasat pirate Grox. During the Galactic Civil War, Grox and his crew captured the freighter Millennium Falcon, which the pirates planned to sell to the Tech Masters of Trionak. PALLAS-Eleven and the Nephran Mirack accompanied Grox aboard the Millennium Falcon, which had been piloted into the Kiax Nebula by Luke Skywalker and Leia Organa of the Rebel Alliance in search of the lost transport Nema. Organa and Skywalker hid inside a compartment of the Falcon, and the pirates assumed the freighter was empty, taking it to Trionak.

PALLAS-Eleven first appeared in Choose Your Destiny: A Luke & Leia Adventure, a novel in the Star Wars: Choose Your Destiny series written by Cavan Scott and published in 2019. In one of the book's non-canonical endings, Luke Skywalker and Leia Organa attack the pirates, but PALLAS-Eleven stuns Organa.
